title: Would appreciate some help with this topic
body: It says in RIOTs reward eligibility that as long the chat ban isn't ACTIVE during season end I still get rewards I just want clarification on this

replies.body: Basically, if you get a chat ban today, and play out all of the games before the season ends, you'll still get rewards. If the season ends and you still have chat restricted games, you won't get those rewards.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AcE7nY9Z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-26T01:42:32.220+0000)
>
> Basically, if you get a chat ban today, and play out all of the games before the season ends, you'll still get rewards. If the season ends and you still have chat restricted games, you won't get those rewards.

thanks
